name: Kendarrian
description:
Loyalty to Empire
The Kendarrians are a human culture built on imperial loyalty, diversity, and adaptability. They honor heroes and have strong religious traditions that sometimes border on zealotry.

options.name: Glorykill
options.description: Whenever you land a killing blow on a Creature your Level or higher, you can grant an allied player a Heroic Action.

options.name: Imperial Diplomacy
options.description: Gain +1 Persuasion and you can speak with authority that commands respect from civilized folk.

options.name: Adaptive Heritage
options.description: Gain +1 Resilience and you recover from exhaustion twice as quickly.
